title: Update store location Google Map to use provided Google Maps link

requirements.text: Update the “Visit Our Store” map section so the store location corresponds to https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA, including providing a visible link/button that opens this exact URL in a new tab from the map section.
acceptanceCriteria: The “Visit Our Store” section provides a clearly visible call-to-action (button or text link) that opens https://maps.app.goo.gl/TkMaKv9cUV83vhFXA in a new tab (uses target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").
The embedded map shown in the iframe is updated (if feasible) to display the same store location as the provided Google Maps link, rather than a generic Korba map view.
All user-facing text added for this change is in English.

constraints: Frontend files in the immutable paths list must not be edited (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not add any backend changes; this is a static frontend update only.
nonGoals: Adding an admin panel or any map management UI.
Adding new authentication or backend data storage.
Changing the Customer Reviews Google Review CTA link (it already uses the provided URL).
